title: Epic 2.1: Recipe Discovery Tool Implementation
description: Implement the 'brain' of the application starting with the recipe discovery tool that will serve as the entry point for the user journey.

subtasks.title: Define TypeScript interfaces for Recipe and RecipePreferences
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Interfaces created with fields for dietary_needs, nutrient_focus, cook_time_max_minutes, prep_time, tools_needed

subtasks.title: Implement mocked getRecipes(preferences) function
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Function returns hardcoded array of 2-3 Recipe objects when called

subtasks.title: Define JSON schema for getRecipes tool for OpenAI API
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Schema accurately describes function purpose and all input parameters

subtasks.title: Integrate getRecipes tool into main agent definition file
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Server compiles and runs with new tool integrated

subtasks.title: Add nutrition scoring and cost analysis to recipe responses
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Each recipe includes nutritional score, estimated cost per serving, cost per gram of protein
